description: Enlargement of existing basement with front and rear lightwells to the house
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Construction management plan, 08-PL-BU-G-P-A, 11-PL-BU-AT-RF-P-a, 10-PL-BU-1F-2F-P-a, 13-PL-BU-SE-P-a, 12-PL-BU-WE-EE-P-a, 01-PL-BU-G-E-a, 07-PL-BU-S-E-a, 02-PL-BU-BA-GF-E-a, 02-PL-BU-BA-GF-E-a, 0 3-PL-BU-1F-2F-E-a, 06-PL-BU-SE-E-a, 05-PL-BU-WE-EE-E-a, Design and access statement Received: 10/03/2022; 08-PL-BU-G-P-A, fire statement 23/03/2022; Unnumbered location plan 31/03/2022; 15-PL-BU-LGF-GF-P-D, 14-PL-BU-S-P-D, 09-PL-BU-BA-GF-P-D Received: 30/05/2022) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The basement hereby permitted shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.

Condition : 6 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.

Condition : 7 - No excavation or construction work shall be undertaken prior to the submission and approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority of a mini Construction Logistics Plan which will include delivery timings, suspension of bays and temporary licence if material storage is required on the public Highway.
